items.content_html: observerly's lightweight, zero-dependency, type safe astrometry library written in TypeScript. This library can be used to ascertain to positions of the Sun, Moon and the planets, as well as ascertain transit times for any astronomical object.

items.content_html: textutils is a lightweight JavaScript utility library designed for text manipulation in React applications. It offers a collection of simple and reusable functions to streamline common text processing tasks, enhancing the readability and maintainability of your code.

It offers a collection of simple and reusable functions to streamline common text processing tasks, enhancing the readability and maintainability of your code.
